channel.title: Adding codes..Help
channel.description:
Well... I have a "auto commands maker". To make commands for me to use in the server. I know how to work with the program... My problem is, where do I put the codes I create?
Please help me.

item.title: Adding codes..Help
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

It’s so easy to make your own commands…Why bother with a command maker?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Adding codes..Help
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

Home, exactly, thats a command… here are three commands…it’s not that hard to figure it out

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("MB")) { sendMessage("gl with your old skool pking =D"); showInterface(1908); teleportToX = 2538; teleportToY = 4716; } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("slayer")) { sendMessage("Slayer like rs, kill npc's for xp."); teleportToX = 2333; teleportToY = 9868; } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("darena")) { sendMessage("you Teleport to the duel arena"); teleportToX = 3384; teleportToY = 3232; }

if you can’t then i cant help a moron learn fake java.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding codes..Help
item.dc:creator: @bower007 bower007
item.description:
@bower007 wrote:

Well I search all client and I could find any saying (bla bla (home)) can I use other one?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding codes..Help
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

open client.java, press CTRL+F and type in Command, keep searching until you see something like this for example

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if(teleblock == true){ sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); //made by Musicmad441 } else { teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3491; sendMessage("You teleport to Home."); } }
Or Possible or items,

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rares") && playerRights >=3) { sendMessage("Use these wisely!! =]"); addItem(1037,1); addItem(1039, 10000); addItem(1041, 10000); addItem(1043, 10000); addItem(1045, 10000); addItem(1047, 10000); addItem(1049, 10000); addItem(1051, 10000); addItem(1054, 10000); addItem(1058, 10000); addItem(1056, 10000); addItem(963, 10000); addItem(1419, 1); }

Then, after the “}”
press Enter, and paste (CTRL+V) your code, easy enough…-.-

Read full topic

item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

You don’t put it at the end of the page, search for command’s i recommend searching “admin” or “home”, and work from their, it’s basically self explanatory from their.

edit:yes client.java

item.title: Adding codes..Help

item.description:
@bower007 wrote:

Sorry but… after what }?

else if (command.startsWith(
In here there is no }...

1st - And I put the codes at end of the page?
2nd - In what java file? client.java?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 14 July 2008, 23:37:11[/size][hr]REALLY NEED HELP PLZ

item.title: Adding codes..Help
item.dc:creator: @Javaftl Javaftl
item.description:
@Javaftl wrote:

First, search for.

else if (command.startsWith(

, and after the last “}” put a space, then enter you’re command.
